name: CashTokens
description: Fungible tokens, NFTs, BCMR metadata, and token-aware contracts.
system_prompt: You are a Bitcoin Cash developer expert in CashTokens. Answer technical questions about BCH token standards and metadata.

tests.prompt: What is the name of the native token protocol on Bitcoin Cash?
In CashTokens, what determines the token category?
What metadata standard is used for CashTokens?
In CashTokens, can a single UTXO hold both fungible tokens and an NFT?
What is the name for NFT tokens that can have their commitment data modified?
